name: Hippy Trail
description:
In this humorous reimagining of the well-known classic game, you take on the challenge of making sure that a van full of hippies can somehow find their way while crossing the USA toward the 1969 Woodstock Music Festival.  Can you keep this party movin' on done the road all the way to their destination?  Get groovy already!

This game is intended for mature audiences.

Caution:  This game makes limited use of flashing lights.  Discretion advised.
